alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 24 at 3:25AM MST until February 27 at 7:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 60 mph with gusts up to 95 mph possible. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains, and Davis. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
